If the workshop we is given again, I would like to see more time allotted to specific
problems and fewer subjects undertaken* In some cases, more than one hour should be
allowed depending on the individual speaker and the subject* The number of general
subjects should be more limited* In short, there was too much material to cover in
one week*
Vfy main hope in attending this workshop was to talk to other people in the field of
video recording to find out just where I stood* It was very reassuring to find that
others have had the same problems and that I was on the right track* I did not find
any single solution for making excellent kine recordings but I feel that it is within
the grasp of the group represented at this meeting if we only had some way of coordi¬
nating our efforts and pooling our knowledge* The knowledge we have is spread too
far and too thin* Many of the individuals most capable of solving these problems
are burdened with other duties and cannot spare the time* Progress will continue to
be slow as long as each station independently tries to solve the same problems*
Jams8 Ho Johnson
